meanings.definition: A solid inorganic substance of natural occurrence.
meanings.sent1: The shiny mineral sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She collected various minerals during her rock hunting trips.
meanings.sent3: The mineral decided to throw a party underground.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was a rare mineral in a world of stone hearts.
meanings.sent5: The mineral's beauty captivated all who gazed upon it.

meanings.sent1: The company extracted valuable minerals from the earth.
meanings.sent2: Miners worked hard to dig out the precious minerals.
meanings.sent3: The mineral was thrilled to be dug up and turned into jewelry.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the mine like a precious mineral.
meanings.sent5: The mineral's value was beyond measure, sought after by all.
